SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Jacquetta Henderson-Rawlings’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope my students will say: Mrs. Rawlings, though she kept it raw, cared for and loved us! I am who I am because of her…”

– Mrs. Jacquetta Henderson-Rawlings, Middle School Science Educator @PropelSchools @CarlowU https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/students-say-she-cared-loved-us/
